CANTRIP.DESCRIPTION: Considered a [#5299DC]Spell[] so long as you have fewer than 2 stacks of [#5299DC]Power[].

FEAT.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played as the first [#FF5252]Arte[] of the turn.

HASTE.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, draw 1 card, gain [E], increase attack damage from cards by 1, and increase block gained from cards by 1.

POISED.DESCRIPTION: Has an additional effect if you have a stack of [#FF5252]Poise[].

POWERFUL.DESCRIPTION: Has an additional effect if you have a stack of [#5299DC]Power[].

SPELLPOWER.DESCRIPTION: Increases the Block gained from and damage dealt by [#5299DC]Spells[].

STONESKIN.DESCRIPTION: Gives 2 block at the start of each turn. This block is affected by any block-affecting powers.

TECHNIQUE.DESCRIPTION: Increases the Block gained from and damage dealt by [#FF5252]Artes[].
